law.catch_line: Title and intent of KRS Chapters 600 to 645.

text.section: KRS Chapters 600 to 645 shall be known as the Kentucky Unified Juvenile Code.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 23, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 20, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 534, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 1, effective March 17, 1998. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1987.

metadata.lrc-note: 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 199 provides: "KRS 446.250 to 446.320 to the contrary notwithstanding, [1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423] shall prevail in the event of a conflict between [1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423] and other Acts passed by the 1986 regular session of the General Assembly."
